# mode

**Instance Property**

Determines the entities transform [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/FromToByAction/from] and [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/FromToByAction/to] are relative to.

## Declaration

```swift
var mode: FromToByAction<Transform>.TransformMode? { get }
```
